mapper.insert: insert into question (title,content, user_id, create_at, comment_count, image_url, address, longitude,latitude) values (#{title},#{content},#{userId},#{createAt},#{commentCount}, #{imageUrl}, #{address}, #{longitude}, #{latitude});
mapper.select: select q.id, q.title, q.content, q.user_id, q.create_at, q.comment_count, i.image_url, i.id as image_id, u.id as u_id, u.name, u.head_url from question q left join question_image i on q.id = i.question_id left join user u on u.id = q.user_id where q.user_id = #{userId} order by id desc

select q.id, q.title, q.content, q.user_id, q.create_at, q.comment_count, i.image_url, i.id as image_id, u.id as u_id, u.name, u.head_url from question q left join question_image i on q.id = i.question_id left join user u on u.id = q.user_id order by id desc
select q.id, q.title, q.content, q.user_id, q.create_at, q.comment_count, i.image_url, i.id as image_id from question q left join question_image i on q.id = i.question_id where q.id = #{qid}
mapper.update: update question set comment_count = #{commentCount} where id = #{id}
